returns._0: True if the lock exists and hasn't been claimed/refunded and timelock hasn't expired
True if the lock exists and hasn't been claimed/refunded and timelock has expired

claim(bytes32,bytes32).details: The secret S must hash to the stored hashLock H

params.lockId: The unique identifier for the lock
params.secret: The secret that hashes to the hashLock (S where H = keccak256(S))

returns._0: The keccak256 hash of the secret

params._owner: The address that will own this contract

params.amount: The amount of tokens to lock
params.hashLock: The hash of the secret (H = keccak256(S))
params.orderId: The associated order ID from the orderbook
params.recipient: The address that can claim with the secret
params.timelock: The Unix timestamp after which funds can be refunded
params.token: The ERC20 token address to lock

returns.lockId: The unique identifier for this lock

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params.lockId: The unique identifier for the lock

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

MAX_TIMELOCK().notice: Maximum timelock duration in seconds (30 days)

MIN_TIMELOCK().notice: Minimum timelock duration in seconds (1 hour)

canClaim(bytes32).notice: Checks if a lock can be claimed

canRefund(bytes32).notice: Checks if a lock can be refunded

claim(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Claims locked tokens by providing the secret

computeHashLock(bytes32).notice: Computes a hash lock from a secret

getLockId(uint256,address,bytes32).notice: Computes a lock ID from its components

lock(uint256,address,address,uint256,byt.notice: Locks tokens in escrow with a hash lock and time lock

locks(bytes32).notice: Mapping from lock ID to Lock struct

pause().notice: Pauses the contract (emergency stop - only affects new locks)

refund(bytes32).notice: Refunds locked tokens after timelock expires
